info.title: Seed Project IMS API
info.description: Inventory Management System for Agricultural Seed Operations

get.description:
ViewSet for Approval Requests.

Endpoints:
- GET /api/approvals/ - List all approval requests
- GET /api/approvals/{id}/ - Get approval request detail
- POST /api/approvals/{id}/approve/ - Approve a request
- POST /api/approvals/{id}/reject/ - Reject a request
- GET /api/approvals/pending/ - Get pending requests
- GET /api/approvals/summary/ - Get approval summary statistics

parameters.name: ordering
parameters.description: Which field to use when ordering the results.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: A page number within the paginated result set.

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: Number of results to return per page.

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: A search term.

parameters.name: status
parameters.description:
Current approval status

* `pending` - Pending
* `approved` - Approved
* `rejected` - Rejected

get.description:
ViewSet for Approval Requests.

Endpoints:
- GET /api/approvals/ - List all approval requests
- GET /api/approvals/{id}/ - Get approval request detail
- POST /api/approvals/{id}/approve/ - Approve a request

- GET /api/approvals/pending/ - Get pending requests
- GET /api/approvals/summary/ - Get approval summary statistics

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: A unique integer value identifying this approval request.

post.description: Approve an approval request.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: A unique integer value identifying this approval request.

post.description: Reject an approval request.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: A unique integer value identifying this approval request.

get.description: Get all pending approval requests.
Get approval request summary statistics.

ViewSet for Audit Logs (read-only).

Audit logs are immutable - they can only be viewed, not modified.

Endpoints:
- GET /api/audit-logs/ - List all audit logs (admin only)
- GET /api/audit-logs/{id}/ - Get audit log detail
- GET /api/audit-logs/summary/ - Get audit summary statistics
- GET /api/audit-logs/my-activity/ - Get current user's activity

parameters.name: action
parameters.description:
Type of action performed

* `create` - Create
* `update` - Update
* `delete` - Delete
* `approve` - Approve
* `reject` - Reject
* `submit` - Submit
* `cancel` - Cancel

parameters.name: ordering
parameters.description: Which field to use when ordering the results.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: A page number within the paginated result set.

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: Number of results to return per page.

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: A search term.

get.description:
ViewSet for Audit Logs (read-only).

Audit logs are immutable - they can only be viewed, not modified.

Endpoints:
- GET /api/audit-logs/ - List all audit logs (admin only)
- GET /api/audit-logs/{id}/ - Get audit log detail
- GET /api/audit-logs/summary/ - Get audit summary statistics
- GET /api/audit-logs/my-activity/ - Get current user's activity

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: A unique integer value identifying this audit log.

get.description: Get current user's activity log.
Get audit log summary statistics.

post.description:
API endpoint for changing password.

POST /api/auth/change-password/

API endpoint for user login.

POST /api/auth/login/
Returns authentication token on successful login.

API endpoint for user logout.

POST /api/auth/logout/
Deletes the user's authentication token.

get.description: Get current user's profile.

ViewSet for Cleaning Events.

Cleaning transforms input lots into cleaned output lots.

Endpoints:
- GET /api/cleaning/ - List all cleaning events
- POST /api/cleaning/ - Create a new cleaning event
- GET /api/cleaning/{id}/ - Get cleaning event detail
- PUT/PATCH /api/cleaning/{id}/ - Update cleaning event (draft/in_progress only)
- DELETE /api/cleaning/{id}/ - Delete cleaning event (draft only)
- POST /api/cleaning/{id}/start/ - Start cleaning event
- POST /api/cleaning/{id}/complete/ - Complete cleaning event
- POST /api/cleaning/{id}/cancel/ - Cancel cleaning event
- POST /api/cleaning/{id}/add_output/ - Add output lot
- DELETE /api/cleaning/{id}/remove_output/{output_id}/ - Remove output lot
- GET /api/cleaning/summary/ - Get cleaning summary statistics

parameters.name: input_lot
parameters.description: Unique identifier for this record

parameters.name: ordering
parameters.description: Which field to use when ordering the results.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: A page number within the paginated result set.

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: Number of results to return per page.

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: A search term.

parameters.name: status
parameters.description:
Current status of the cleaning event

* `draft` - Draft
* `in_progress` - In Progress
* `completed` - Completed
* `cancelled` - Cancelled

post.description: Create cleaning event and return detail serializer.

Cancel a cleaning event.

Complete a cleaning event.

This creates output lots and reduces the input lot quantity.

DELETE /api/locations/{id}/ - Deactivate location (admin only)

get.description:
API endpoint for lot management.

Lots are the core traceable unit in the inventory system.
They are typically created via SRV approval, not directly.

GET /api/lots/ - List all lots
POST /api/lots/ - Create lot directly (admin only, prefer SRV)
GET /api/lots/{id}/ - Get lot details
GET /api/lots/{id}/trace/ - Get full traceability
GET /api/lots/{id}/movements/ - Get movement history
GET /api/lots/summary/ - Get lot statistics

parameters.name: ordering
parameters.description: Which field to use when ordering the results.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: A page number within the paginated result set.

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: Number of results to return per page.

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: A search term.

parameters.name: seed_class
parameters.description: Unique identifier for this record

parameters.name: seed_product
parameters.description: Unique identifier for this record

parameters.name: source_type
parameters.description:
Origin type of this lot

* `internal` - Internal
* `in_grower` - In-Grower
* `out_grower` - Out-Grower

parameters.name: status
parameters.description:
Current lot status

* `stored` - Stored
* `cleaned` - Cleaned
* `issued` - Issued
* `exhausted` - Exhausted

parameters.name: warehouse
parameters.description: Unique identifier for this record

post.description:
API endpoint for lot management.

Lots are the core traceable unit in the inventory system.
They are typically created via SRV approval, not directly.

GET /api/lots/ - List all lots
POST /api/lots/ - Create lot directly (admin only, prefer SRV)
GET /api/lots/{id}/ - Get lot details
GET /api/lots/{id}/trace/ - Get full traceability
GET /api/lots/{id}/movements/ - Get movement history
GET /api/lots/summary/ - Get lot statistics

get.description:
API endpoint for lot management.

Lots are the core traceable unit in the inventory system.

GET /api/lots/ - List all lots
POST /api/lots/ - Create lot directly (admin only, prefer SRV)
GET /api/lots/{id}/ - Get lot details
GET /api/lots/{id}/trace/ - Get full traceability
GET /api/lots/{id}/movements/ - Get movement history
GET /api/lots/summary/ - Get lot statistics

put.description: Only notes can be updated on a lot.

patch.description:
API endpoint for lot management.

Lots are the core traceable unit in the inventory system.
They are typically created via SRV approval, not directly.

GET /api/lots/ - List all lots
POST /api/lots/ - Create lot directly (admin only, prefer SRV)
GET /api/lots/{id}/ - Get lot details
GET /api/lots/{id}/trace/ - Get full traceability
GET /api/lots/{id}/movements/ - Get movement history
GET /api/lots/summary/ - Get lot statistics

delete.description: Lots cannot be deleted - they are immutable for traceability.

get.description:
Get chronological movement history for a lot.

GET /api/lots/{id}/movements/

Get full traceability for a lot.

Shows origin, all movements, and related lots.

GET /api/lots/{id}/trace/

Get lots with available quantity (for SIV creation).

GET /api/lots/available/
Optional query params: warehouse, seed_class, seed_product, min_quantity

Get lots grouped by source type.

GET /api/lots/by-source/

Get lot statistics and summary.

GET /api/lots/summary/
Optional query params: warehouse, seed_class

Cleaning summary report.

GET /api/reports/cleaning-summary/
Query params:
- start_date: Filter by start date (YYYY-MM-DD)
- end_date: Filter by end date (YYYY-MM-DD)

Dashboard overview with key metrics.

GET /api/reports/dashboard/

Seed distribution report.

GET /api/reports/seed-distribution/
Query params:
- start_date: Filter by start date (YYYY-MM-DD)
- end_date: Filter by end date (YYYY-MM-DD)
- purpose: Filter by distribution purpose

SIV register report.

GET /api/reports/siv-register/
Query params:
- warehouse: Filter by warehouse ID
- status: Filter by status
- purpose: Filter by purpose
- start_date: Filter by start date (YYYY-MM-DD)
- end_date: Filter by end date (YYYY-MM-DD)

SRV register report.

GET /api/reports/srv-register/
Query params:
- warehouse: Filter by warehouse ID
- status: Filter by status
- start_date: Filter by start date (YYYY-MM-DD)
- end_date: Filter by end date (YYYY-MM-DD)

Stock summary report.

GET /api/reports/stock-summary/
Query params:
- warehouse: Filter by warehouse ID
- seed_class: Filter by seed class ID
- seed_product: Filter by seed product ID

API endpoint for seed class management.

GET /api/seed-classes/ - List all seed classes
POST /api/seed-classes/ - Create seed class (admin only)
GET /api/seed-classes/{id}/ - Get seed class details
PUT /api/seed-classes/{id}/ - Update seed class (admin only)
DELETE /api/seed-classes/{id}/ - Deactivate seed class (admin only)

parameters.name: name
parameters.description:
Seed class name

* `breeder` - Breeder Seeds
* `foundation` - Foundation Seeds (Premium)
* `certified` - Certified Seeds

ViewSet for Store Issuing Vouchers (SIV).

SIV is the only mechanism for stock exit from the system.

Endpoints:
- GET /api/siv/ - List all SIVs
- POST /api/siv/ - Create a new SIV with items
- GET /api/siv/{id}/ - Get SIV detail
- PUT/PATCH /api/siv/{id}/ - Update SIV (draft only)
- DELETE /api/siv/{id}/ - Delete SIV (draft only)
- POST /api/siv/{id}/submit/ - Submit SIV for approval
- POST /api/siv/{id}/approve/ - Approve SIV (reduces lot quantities)
- POST /api/siv/{id}/reject/ - Reject SIV
- POST /api/siv/{id}/add_item/ - Add item to SIV
- DELETE /api/siv/{id}/remove_item/{item_id}/ - Remove item from SIV
- GET /api/siv/summary/ - Get SIV summary statistics

parameters.name: ordering
parameters.description: Which field to use when ordering the results.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: A page number within the paginated result set.

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: Number of results to return per page.

parameters.name: purpose
parameters.description:
Purpose of issue

* `sale` - Sale
* `settlement` - Settlement
* `transfer` - Transfer

parameters.name: recipient_type
parameters.description:
Type of recipient

* `customer` - Customer
* `grower` - Grower
* `internal` - Internal

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: A search term.

parameters.name: status
parameters.description:
Current status of the SIV

* `draft` - Draft
* `pending` - Pending Approval
* `approved` - Approved
* `rejected` - Rejected
* `completed` - Completed
* `cancelled` - Cancelled

parameters.name: warehouse
parameters.description: Unique identifier for this record

post.description: Create SIV and return detail serializer.

get.description:

SIV is the only mechanism for stock exit from the system.

- POST /api/siv/{id}/approve/ - Approve SIV (reduces lot quantities)
- POST /api/siv/{id}/reject/ - Reject SIV
- POST /api/siv/{id}/add_item/ - Add item to SIV
- DELETE /api/siv/{id}/remove_item/{item_id}/ - Remove item from SIV

SIV is the only mechanism for stock exit from the system.

Endpoints:
- GET /api/siv/ - List all SIVs
- POST /api/siv/ - Create a new SIV with items
- GET /api/siv/{id}/ - Get SIV detail
- PUT/PATCH /api/siv/{id}/ - Update SIV (draft only)

delete.description: Only allow deletion of draft SIVs.

post.description: Add an item to a draft SIV.

Approve an SIV and reduce lot quantities.

This is the core action that reduces inventory from the lots.
Only managers and admins can approve SIVs.

get.description: Get all items for an SIV.

post.description:
Reject an SIV.

Only managers and admins can reject SIVs.
A reason for rejection is required.

delete.description: Remove an item from a draft SIV.

post.description: Submit an SIV for approval.

get.description: Get all pending SIVs awaiting approval.
Get SIV summary statistics.

ViewSet for Store Receiving Vouchers (SRV).

SRV is the only mechanism for stock entry into the system.

Endpoints:
- GET /api/srv/ - List all SRVs
- POST /api/srv/ - Create a new SRV with items
- GET /api/srv/{id}/ - Get SRV detail
- PUT/PATCH /api/srv/{id}/ - Update SRV (draft only)
- DELETE /api/srv/{id}/ - Delete SRV (draft only)
- POST /api/srv/{id}/submit/ - Submit SRV for approval
- POST /api/srv/{id}/approve/ - Approve SRV (creates lots)
- POST /api/srv/{id}/reject/ - Reject SRV
- POST /api/srv/{id}/add_item/ - Add item to SRV
- DELETE /api/srv/{id}/remove_item/{item_id}/ - Remove item from SRV
- GET /api/srv/summary/ - Get SRV summary statistics

parameters.name: ordering
parameters.description: Which field to use when ordering the results.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: A page number within the paginated result set.

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: Number of results to return per page.

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: A search term.

parameters.name: status
parameters.description:
Current status of the SRV

* `draft` - Draft
* `pending` - Pending Approval
* `approved` - Approved
* `rejected` - Rejected
* `completed` - Completed
* `cancelled` - Cancelled

parameters.name: warehouse
parameters.description: Unique identifier for this record

- DELETE /api/srv/{id}/ - Delete SRV (draft only)
- POST /api/srv/{id}/submit/ - Submit SRV for approval
- POST /api/srv/{id}/approve/ - Approve SRV (creates lots)
- POST /api/srv/{id}/reject/ - Reject SRV
- POST /api/srv/{id}/add_item/ - Add item to SRV
- DELETE /api/srv/{id}/remove_item/{item_id}/ - Remove item from SRV
- GET /api/srv/summary/ - Get SRV summary statistics

patch.description:
ViewSet for Store Receiving Vouchers (SRV).

SRV is the only mechanism for stock entry into the system.

Endpoints:
- GET /api/srv/ - List all SRVs
- POST /api/srv/ - Create a new SRV with items
- GET /api/srv/{id}/ - Get SRV detail
- PUT/PATCH /api/srv/{id}/ - Update SRV (draft only)
- DELETE /api/srv/{id}/ - Delete SRV (draft only)
- POST /api/srv/{id}/submit/ - Submit SRV for approval
- POST /api/srv/{id}/approve/ - Approve SRV (creates lots)
- POST /api/srv/{id}/reject/ - Reject SRV
- POST /api/srv/{id}/add_item/ - Add item to SRV
- DELETE /api/srv/{id}/remove_item/{item_id}/ - Remove item from SRV
- GET /api/srv/summary/ - Get SRV summary statistics

delete.description: Only allow deletion of draft SRVs.

post.description: Add an item to a draft SRV.

Approve an SRV and create lots.

This is the core action that creates inventory lots from the SRV items.
Only managers and admins can approve SRVs.

get.description: Get all items for an SRV.

post.description:
Reject an SRV.

Only managers and admins can reject SRVs.
A reason for rejection is required.

delete.description: Remove an item from a draft SRV.

post.description: Submit an SRV for approval.

get.description: Get all pending SRVs awaiting approval.
Get SRV summary statistics.

DELETE /api/users/{id}/ - Deactivate user (soft delete)
